sentences.sentence: You're always crabbier when your eyes are black-I expect it then.
sentences.translation: 你的眼睛是黑色的时候，你总是要烦躁一些。

sentences.sentence: You're always crabbier when your eyes are black - I expect it then, "I".
sentences.translation: 当你的眼睛是黑色的时候，你总要更暴躁些——我想是这样的。

sentences.sentence: You're always crabbier when your eyes are black-I expect it then. (Bella)
sentences.translation: 你的眼睛是黑色的时候，你总是要烦躁一些。
